elements.title: Benjamin William Page
elements.contents: ... that Admiral Benjamin William Page was tasked with announcing the start of the Napoleonic Wars to the East Indies, using HMS Caroline (pictured)?

elements.title: Rings of Power
elements.contents: ... that the music for the video game Rings of Power was composed by a first-year medical student?

elements.title: Jean-Paul Jeannotte
elements.contents: ... that Jean-Paul Jeannotte, founder and first artistic director of the Opéra de Montréal, performed the role of Bobino more than 100 times, in the premiere on CBC TV and on stages on a Canada tour?

elements.title: A Beautiful Crime
elements.contents: ... that according to Christopher Bollen, much of his 2020 novel A Beautiful Crime was written in a 17th-century monastery?

elements.title: at the Paralympics
elements.contents: ... that the small island of Aruba was at the Paralympics because Shardea Arias de la Cru thought they should be?

elements.title: Sawmill Fire
elements.contents: ... that the Sawmill Fire of 2017, which burned more than 45,000 acres (18,000 ha), was started at a gender reveal party?

elements.title: Park Chan-dea
elements.contents: ... that Park Chan-dea is the only male wushu athlete to be a six-time world champion?

elements.title: KPEC-TV
elements.contents: ... that Washington state educational TV station KPEC-TV bought and repaired a video tape recorder that had fallen off a forklift and been written off?
